name: hpc-cloud
description: Virtual platform for running simulation and visualization

scripts.fix-autobahn: sed -i.bak 's/WAMP_FEATURES = {/var WAMP_FEATURES = {/' ./node_modules/autobahn/lib/session.js && sed -i.bak 's/var var WAMP_FEATURES = {/var WAMP_FEATURES = {/' ./node_modules/autobahn/lib/session.js && rm ./node_modules/autobahn/lib/session.js.bak
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.dep:webpack: npm install node-libs-browser@0.5.2 autoprefixer-loader@2.0.0 babel-core@5.8.22 babel-loader@5.3.2 css-loader@0.16.0 expose-loader@0.7.0 file-loader@0.8.4 html-webpack-plugin@1.6.1 jshint@2.8.0 jshint-loader@0.8.3 json-loader@^0.5.2 shader-loader@1.1.3 style-loader@0.12.3 url-loader@0.5.6 webpack@1.11.0
scripts.dep:travis: npm run dep:webpack && npm run dep:release
scripts.dep:local: npm run dep:webpack && npm run dep:www && npm run dep:release
scripts.dep:global: npm run dep:webpack -- -g && npm run dep:www -- -g && npm run dep:release -- -g
